body:
It's the moment that many have cried and shouted and raged and blah blah blah, and another moment that is pretty much the same thing. 

1.8 Pre-release! Get all of your 1.8 features right now, the moment that had actually started about 5 days ago! 

1.8 is coming out early next week! The day of the longest waited for update, the update with the most snapshots, the update with the most bug fixes, 1.8! (Which is probably starting whenever lots of people will go to school at!)

Prepare for faster rendering, more features, more decoration, something many have waited and cried and blah blah blahed for, and another pain is the butt for ALL server owners! Man, won't it be fun for a server to update to 1.8, and realize that time spent was wasted, and those people will probably reel back to 1.7 versions, and the people and wait until all those delicious features are here!

Get your 1.8 pre-release in the snapshot. Oh boy hype!

It's a good thing you already know because this is version 3 of the pre-release!


EDIT: Well, It's my honour to tell the people that don't follow mojang's talking that 1.8 is coming out on this TUESDAY!  hype

title: The moment you've been waiting for...

oh.

Well, erm, I wonder how long bukkit will take to update.
